creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Merksy
description: cream ground with orange around edges of sheet and pale grey wash; four applied rectangular collage elements; one rectangle of blue and white striped cloth with orange and green lines at right; red blotchy rectangle with black linear marks at top center; mottle black organic form at top center beneath red rectangle; scratchy black marks, ink spots and reddish-black square beneath mottled organic form
markings: on back of frame: Roger Ramsay Gallery and Weinstein Gallery labels
provenance: First Bank, Minneapolis; (Weinstein Gallery , Minneapolis); Mary and Robert Mersky, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2015.
title: Untitled
